text: Cristian César Gómez (4 November 1987 – 24 May 2015) was an Argentine professional footballer who played as a defender for 9 de Julio de Rafaela, Deportivo Armenio, Sportivo Patria and Atlético Paraná. He died during a game in May 2015. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:9 de Julio de Rafaela players Category:Deportivo Armenio footballers Category:Sportivo Patria footballers Category:Club Atlético Paraná players Category:Association football defenders
title: Cristian Gómez (footballer, born 1987)
